name: Anduin Transactions, Inc.
description: Developer of modular and interoperable tools designed to revolutionize the investor onboarding experience in the alternative and private markets. The company's platform engages limited partners with marketing-focused data rooms and provides a secure and collaborative environment to navigate the complex subscription process, enabling clients to connect with limited partners and general partners efficiently.
one_liner: Developer of modular and interoperable tools designed to revolutionize the investor onboarding experience in the alternative and private markets. The company's platform engages limited partners with marketing-focused data rooms and provides a secure and collaborative environment to navigate the complex subscription process, enabling clients to connect with limited partners and general partners efficiently.
